languages.text: Молебен по павшим транслируют по всему флагману. В последующие дни люди выстраиваются в очередь, чтобы почтить память мучеников в корабельных часовнях.
A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.
languages.original_text: Молебен по павшим транслируют по всему флагману. В последующие дни люди выстраиваются в очередь, чтобы почтить память мучеников в корабельных часовнях.

traits.locale_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. On the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.
A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. On the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.
A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

languages.text: Ein Gebet für die Gefallenen wird auf dem gesamten Flaggschiff übertragen. In den folgenden Tagen stehen die Leute Schlange, um die Märtyrer in den Kapellen des Schiffs zu ehren.
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

traits.locale_text: Ein Gebet für die Gefallenen wird auf dem gesamten Flaggschiff übertragen. In den folgenden Tagen stehen die Leute Schlange, um die Märtyrer in den Kapellen des Schiffs zu ehren.

languages.text: Un office funèbre à la mémoire des défunts est diffusé à bord du vaisseau amiral. Au cours des jours suivants, les gens défilent dans les chapelles pour rendre hommage aux martyrs.
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

traits.locale_text: Un office funèbre à la mémoire des défunts est diffusé à bord du vaisseau amiral. Au cours des jours suivants, les gens défilent dans les chapelles pour rendre hommage aux martyrs.

languages.text: Se retransmite un servicio de oración por los caídos a través de toda la nave insignia. En los días que siguen, la gente hace cola para honrar a los mártires en las capillas de la nave.
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

traits.locale_text: Se retransmite un servicio de oración por los caídos a través de toda la nave insignia. En los días que siguen, la gente hace cola para honrar a los mártires en las capillas de la nave.

languages.text: 戦没者のための祈りの儀式が旗艦全体に放送される。翌日には、船内の礼拝堂に殉職者を痛む人々が列をなした。
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

traits.locale_text: 戦没者のための祈りの儀式が旗艦全体に放送される。翌日には、船内の礼拝堂に殉職者を痛む人々が列をなした。

languages.text: 死者的祈祷仪式在整艘旗舰上进行了播放。在接下来的几天里，许多人排着长队，在船上的礼拜堂里纪念这些烈士。
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.

traits.locale_text: 死者的祈祷仪式在整艘旗舰上进行了播放。在接下来的几天里，许多人排着长队，在船上的礼拜堂里纪念这些烈士。

languages.text: Canını kaybedenler adına düzenlenen kutsal ayin, sancak gemisi boyunca yayımlanıyor. İnsanlar, ilerleyen günlerde geminin şapellerindeki şehitleri onurlandırmak için sıraya giriyor.
languages.original_text: A prayer service for the fallen is broadcast throughout the flagship. In the following days, people line up to honour the martyrs in the ship's chapels.
